name: jackett
description: Jackett acts as a proxy between torrent indexers and apps like Sonarr or Radarr. It translates queries into many tracker specific formats, providing a single unified API so self hosted media automation stacks can search dozens of sources.
features: Indexer Proxy: Unified API for torrent trackers, Multi-source search, Automation integration. Connect dozens of indexers to your media stack.
Query Translation: Convert searches to tracker formats, Standardized responses, Cross-platform compatibility. One API for all trackers.
Media Automation: Sonarr and Radarr integration, Automatic downloads, Release monitoring. Streamline your media workflow.
